name: My Name Is Pauli Murray
description: A look at the life and ideas of Pauli Murray, a non-binary Black lawyer, activist and poet who influenced both Ruth Bader Ginsburg and Thurgood Marshall.

review.author: kbrett-03795
review.heading: Why?????
review.reviewBody:
Why weren't we taught about Ms Murray??? It makes me angry that she has been hidden from me all my life!!!!

Extremely intelligent, Ms Murray should be held out, lauded and become a household name, known throughout the world!!! Extraordinary and well before her time!!!

keywords: documentary subject's name in title,non binary,civil rights,gender discrimination,human rights activist
